title.zh: 《宋微子世家》 House of Song Wei Zi
title.raw: 《宋微子世家》 House of Song Wei Zi

sentences.zh: 微子開者，殷帝乙之首子而帝紂之庶兄也。

translations.text: Wei Zi Kai was the eldest son of Emperor Yi of Yin and the half-brother of Emperor Zhou.

sentences.zh: 紂既立，不明，淫亂於政，微子數諫，紂不聽。

translations.text: After Zhou ascended the throne, he was unenlightened and indulged in debauchery in his governance. Wei Zi repeatedly remonstrated with him, but Zhou would not listen.

sentences.zh: 及祖伊以周西伯昌之修德，滅黎國，懼禍至，以告紂。

translations.text: He sent Zi Xi Bo Chang to cultivate virtue and extinguish the state of Li, fearing that Zhou would grow even more arrogant.

sentences.zh: 紂曰：「我生不有命在天乎？

translations.text: Zhou said: 'Was I not born with the Mandate of Heaven?

sentences.zh: 是何能為！」

translations.text: What can anyone do to me!'

sentences.zh: 於是微子度紂終不可諫，欲死之，及去，未能自決，乃問於太師、少師曰：「殷不有治政，不治四方。

translations.text: Wei Zi realized that Zhou could not be advised and would surely bring ruin to Yin, so he pretended to be mad and fled, not daring to return.

sentences.zh: 我祖遂陳於上，紂沈湎於酒，婦人是用，亂敗湯德於下。

translations.text: He said: 'My ancestor Sui Ren displayed the virtue of fire above, but Zhou wallows in wine and women, causing the collapse of the Yin dynasty.

sentences.zh: 殷既小大好草竊姦宄，卿士師師非度，皆有罪辜，乃無維獲，小民乃并興，相為敵讎。

translations.text: Yin has been plagued by great evils, theft, lewdness, and rebellion. The ministers, scholars, and teachers have all fled.

sentences.zh: 今殷其典喪！

translations.text: Now the Yin dynasty's model has perished!

sentences.zh: 若涉水無津涯。

translations.text: It is like a river crossing with no banks or shores.

sentences.zh: 殷遂喪，越至于今。」

translations.text: The people have no one to rely on.'

sentences.zh: 曰：「太師，少師，我其發出往？

translations.text: Wei Zi then fled to the state of Song.

sentences.zh: 吾家保于喪？

translations.text: King Wu of Zhou attacked Zhou and destroyed Yin, then enfeoffed Wei Zi at Song, saying: 'You are a worthy descendant of the Yin house.

sentences.zh: 今女無故告予，顛躋，如之何其？」

translations.text: Do not let your virtue be cut off.'

sentences.zh: 太師若曰：「王子，天篤下菑亡殷國，乃毋畏畏，不用老長。

translations.text: Wei Zi received the enfeoffment and became the Song lord, and the people of Song attached themselves to him.

sentences.zh: 今殷民乃陋淫神祇之祀。

translations.text: When King Wu died and King Cheng ascended the throne, the Duke of Zhou acted as regent and led the campaign against the eastern states.

sentences.zh: 今誠得治國，國治身死不恨。

translations.text: Wei Zi went to see the Duke of Zhou and said: 'The Yin people are not yet settled, and the eastern states are rising up.

sentences.zh: 為死，終不得治，不如去。」

translations.text: Why don't you enfeoff the descendants of the Yin house to rule over them?'

sentences.zh: 遂亡。

translations.text: The Duke of Zhou said: 'The Yin house committed many crimes, and the people still resent them.

Now Yin people then vulgar lewd ghosts spirits sacrifices. Now truly obtain govern country, country govern body die not hate. For die, finally not obtain govern, not like go.' Then fled.

sentences.zh: 箕子者，紂親戚也。

translations.text: If I enfeoff their descendants, the people will surely not submit.

sentences.zh: 紂始為象箸，箕子嘆曰：「彼為象箸，必為玉桮；

translations.text: I will enfeoff you instead - you are a worthy man, and the people will attach themselves to you.'

sentences.zh: 為桮，則必思遠方珍怪之物而御之矣。

sentences.zh: 輿馬宮室之漸自此始，不可振也。」

translations.text: Wei Zi declined, saying: 'I am a remnant of Yin, and my virtue is not sufficient.

sentences.zh: 紂為淫泆，箕子諫，不聽。

translations.text: The people of Wei are fierce and difficult to govern.

sentences.zh: 人或曰：「可以去矣。」

translations.text: I fear I cannot control them.'

sentences.zh: 箕子曰：「為人臣諫不聽而去，是彰君之惡而自說於民，吾不忍為也。」

translations.text: The Duke of Zhou said: 'Go and govern them with benevolence.

sentences.zh: 乃被髪詳狂而為奴。

translations.text: The people are like water - they will follow where you lead them.'

sentences.zh: 遂隱而鼓琴以自悲，故傳之曰箕子操。

translations.text: Wei Zi then went to Wei and governed with benevolence, and the people of Wei attached themselves to him.

Ji Zi, Zhou close relative. translations.text: In the time of Wei Zi's son Kang Shu, the people praised him and called him Kang Shu.

sentences.zh: 見箕子諫不聽而為奴，則曰：「君有過而不以死爭，則百姓何辜！」

五曰皇極：皇建其有極，斂時五福，用傅錫其庶民。 六曰三德：一曰正直，二曰剛克，三曰柔克。 平康正直，彊弗友剛克，燮友柔克。 沉潛剛克，高明柔克。 七曰稽疑：擇建立卜筮人，乃命卜筮，曰雨，曰霽，曰蒙，曰驛，曰克，曰貞，曰悔，凡七。 卜五，占之用二，衍貣。 八曰庶徵：曰雨，曰暘，曰燠，曰寒，曰風，曰時。 五者來備，各以其敘，庶草蕃庑。 一極備，凶；一極亡，凶。 曰休徵：曰肅，時雨若，寧風若。 曰咎徵：曰僭，恒雨若，烝風若。 曰王省惟歲，卿士惟月，師尹惟日。 歲月日時無易，百穀用成，治用明，畯民用章，家用平康。 日月歲時既易，百穀用不成，治用昏不明，畯民用微，家用不寧。 庶民惟星，星有好風，星有好雨。 日月之行，有冬有夏。 月之從星，則以風雨。 九曰五福：一曰壽，二曰富，三曰康寧，四曰攸好德，五曰考終命。 六極：一曰凶短折，二曰疾，三曰憂，四曰貧，五曰惡，六曰弱。 於是武王乃封箕子於朝鮮而不臣也。 Said heavenly son make people parents, to be world wang.

sentences.zh: 陳成，宋人擊之。

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.

sentences.zh: 宋師大敗，襄公傷股。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

sentences.zh: 國人皆怨公。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 公曰：「君子不困人於阸，不鼓不成列。」

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 子魚曰：「兵以勝為功，何常言與！

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 必如公言，即奴事之耳，又何戰為？」

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

文公元年，楚太子商臣弒其父成王代立。 三年，文公名佐，改曰鮑牛。 四年，楚滅江。 秦滅小戎。 九年，文公卒，子共公瑕立。 共公十年，楚莊王即位。 十六年，共公卒，子平公成立。 平公三年，楚使魯申叔時聘于宋。 四年，魯孝公卒。 十年，宋伐魯，取長葛。 十八年，平公卒，子元公佐立。 元公三年，楚公子弃疾弒其君靈王而自立。 二十二年，晉平公卒。 二十四年，宋火。 元公饑，食楚司馬子西之粟，曰：「誰謂宋遠？ 吾猶食之。」 二十五年，孔子過宋。 二十七年，元公卒，子景公頭曼立。 景公二十五年，晉大夫智伯滅范、中行氏。 二十七年，景公卒，子公孫周立。 公孫周卒，子悼公購由立。 悼公元年，晉滅智伯，分其地。 悼公八年，宋伐魯，取地。 十二年，悼公卒，子剔成立。 剔成四十一年，剔成弟偃攻襲剔成，剔成敗奔齊，偃自立為宋君。

sentences.zh: 楚成王已救鄭，鄭享之；

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 去而取鄭二姬以歸。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 叔瞻曰：「成王無禮，其不沒乎？

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 為禮卒於無別，有以知其不遂霸也。」

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.
東敗齊，取五城； 南敗楚，取地三百里； 西敗魏軍，乃與齊、魏為敵國。 盛血以韋囊，縣而射之，命曰「射天」。

sentences.zh: 是年，晉公子重耳過宋，襄公以傷於楚，欲得晉援，厚禮重耳以馬二十乘。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.
君偃二十五年，十一月，剔成弟偃弒剔成于雍丘，立剔成之子肥。

sentences.zh: 十四年夏，襄公病傷於泓而竟卒，子成公王臣立。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.
是年，剔成奔齊。

sentences.zh: 成公元年，晉文公即位。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 三年，倍楚盟親晉，以有德於文公也。

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 四年，楚成王伐宋，宋告急於晉。

translations.text: Yuan Gong's son was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 五年，晉文公救宋，楚兵去。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 九年，晉文公卒。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 十一年，楚太子商臣弒其父成王代立。

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 十六年，秦穆公卒。

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.
二十六年，齊魏伐宋，執宋君偃。 宋立剔成之子肥，是為康王。 康王即位三十七年，家有祟，夜鬼擊之，康王不知，遂射鬼。 時有好鬼祟者為之言曰：「王實無好，百姓惡也。 王將以民為戮乎？」 其後康王為無道，為諸侯所討伐。 秦始皇二十二年，秦滅魏，二十四年，秦兵遂滅宋，而天下壹并于秦。

sentences.zh: 十七年，成公卒。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

sentences.zh: 成公弟御殺太子及大司馬公孫固而自立為君。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 宋人共殺君御而立成公少子杵臼，是為昭公。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.
太史公曰：孔子稱「微子去之，箕子為之奴，比干諫而死，殷有三仁焉」。 夏桀之時，微子開辟，遭纣之世，君有辱民，臣有辱身。 或干王誅，或隨而死，或佯狂而去。

sentences.zh: 昭公四年，宋敗長翟緣斯於長丘。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 七年，楚莊王即位。

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.
其譬至於今，豈不痛乎！ 宋襄公之時，諸侯以力相爭，宋獨為仁義，弱而見取。

sentences.zh: 九年，昭公無道，國人不附。

translations.text: Yuan Gong's son was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 昭公弟鮑革賢而下士。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 先，襄公夫人欲通於公子鮑，不可，乃助之施於國，因大夫華元為右師。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 昭公出獵，夫人王姬使衛伯攻殺昭公杵臼。

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 弟鮑革立，是為文公。

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.

此以宋襄之賢而不能自立也。 傷哉！ Previously, Xiang Gong wife wished communicate with gong zi Bao, not able, then helped him exert in country, because grand master Hua Yuan as right teacher. Zhao Gong exited hunt, wife Wang Ji sent Wei Bo attack kill Zhao Gong Chu Jiu. Younger brother Bao Ge established, this was Wen Gong.

sentences.zh: 文公元年，晉率諸侯伐宋，責以弒君。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

sentences.zh: 聞文公定立，乃去。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 二年，昭公子因文公母弟須與武、繆、戴、莊、桓之族為亂，文公盡誅之，出武、繆之族。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.

Wen Gong first year, Jin led feudal lords attacked Song, blamed with assassinate lord. Heard Wen Gong settled established, then left. Second year, Zhao Gong son because Wen Gong mother younger brother Xu with Wu, Mu, Dai, Zhuang, Huan clans made disorder, Wen Gong completely executed them, exited Wu, Mu clans.

sentences.zh: 四年春，（鄭）［楚］命（楚）［鄭］伐宋。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 宋使華元將，鄭敗宋，囚華元。

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 華元之將戰，殺羊以食士，其御羊羹不及，故怨，馳入鄭軍，故宋師敗，得囚華元。

translations.text: Yuan Gong's son was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 宋以兵車百乘文馬四百匹贖華元。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 未盡入，華元亡歸宋。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

Fourth year spring, Zheng commanded Zheng attacked Song. Song sent Hua Yuan lead, Zheng defeated Song, imprisoned Hua Yuan. Hua Yuan about battle, killed sheep to feed scholars, his driver sheep soup not obtain, so resented, galloped entered Zheng army, so Song army defeated, obtained imprisoned Hua Yuan. Song with war chariots hundred rode decorated horses four hundred pairs redeemed Hua Yuan. Not completely entered, Hua Yuan fled returned Song.

sentences.zh: 十四年，楚莊王圍鄭。

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 鄭伯降楚，楚復釋之。

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.
Fourteenth year, Chu Zhuang Wang surrounded Zheng. Zheng Bo surrendered Chu, Chu again released him.

sentences.zh: 十六年，楚使過宋，宋有前仇，執楚使。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

sentences.zh: 九月，楚莊王圍宋。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 十七年，楚以圍宋五月不解，宋城中急，無食，華元乃夜私見楚將子反。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 子反告莊王。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 王問：「城中何如？」

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 曰：「析骨而炊，易子而食。」

translations.text: Yuan Gong's son was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 莊王曰：「誠哉言！

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 我軍亦有二日糧。」

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 以信故，遂罷兵去。

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

Sixteenth year, Chu envoy passed Song, Song had previous enmity, seized Chu envoy. Ninth month, Chu Zhuang Wang surrounded Song. Seventeenth year, Chu with surround Song five months not resolved, Song city middle urgent, no food, Hua Yuan then night privately saw Chu general Zi Fan. Zi Fan informed Zhuang Wang. Wang asked: 'City middle what like?' Said: 'Split bones cook, exchange sons eat.' Zhuang Wang said: 'Truly words! My army also has two days grain.' With trust reason, then stopped troops left.

sentences.zh: 二十二年，文公卒，子共公瑕立。

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.

sentences.zh: 始厚葬。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

sentences.zh: 君子譏華元不臣矣。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.
Twenty-second year, Wen Gong died, son Gong Gong Xia established. Began thick burial. Jun Zi criticized Hua Yuan not minister.

sentences.zh: 共公（元）［十］年，華元善楚將子重，又善晉將欒書，兩盟晉楚。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 十三年，共公卒。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 華元為右師，魚石為左師。

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 司馬唐山攻殺太子肥，欲殺華元，華元奔晉，魚石止之，至河乃還，誅唐山。

translations.text: Yuan Gong's son was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 乃立共公少子成，是為平公。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

Gong Gong tenth year, Hua Yuan friendly Chu general Zi Chong, also friendly Jin general Luan Shu, both allied Jin Chu. Thirteenth year, Gong Gong died. Hua Yuan as right teacher, Yu Shi as left teacher. Commander Tang Shan attacked killed crown prince Fei, wished kill Hua Yuan, Hua Yuan fled Jin, Yu Shi stopped him, to river then returned, executed Tang Shan. Then established Gong Gong young son Cheng, this was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 平公三年，楚共王拔宋之彭城，以封宋左師魚石。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 四年，諸侯共誅魚石，而歸彭城於宋。

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 三十五年，楚公子圍弒其君自立，為靈王。

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.

sentences.zh: 四十四年，平公卒，子元公佐立。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

Ping Gong third year, Chu Gong Wang pulled Song's Peng Cheng, to enfeoff left teacher Yu Shi. Fourth year, feudal lords together executed Yu Shi, returned Peng Cheng to Song. Thirty-fifth year, Chu gong zi Wei assassinated his lord self established, became Ling Wang. Forty-fourth year, Ping Gong died, son Yuan Gong Zuo established.

sentences.zh: 元公三年，楚公子棄疾弒靈王，自立為平王。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 八年，宋火。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 十年，元公毋信，詐殺諸公子，大夫華、向氏作亂。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 楚平王太子建來奔，見諸華氏相攻亂，建去如鄭。

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 十五年，元公為魯昭公避季氏居外，為之求入魯，行道卒，子景公頭曼立。

translations.text: Yuan Gong's son was Zhuang Gong.

Yuan Gong third year, Chu gong zi Qi Ji assassinated Ling Wang, self established as Ping Wang. Eighth year, Song fire. Tenth year, Yuan Gong Wu Xin, falsely killed various gong zi, grand master Hua, Xiang clans made disorder. Chu Ping Wang crown prince Jian came fled, saw various Hua clans mutually attacked disorder, Jian left went Zheng. Fifteenth year, Yuan Gong for Lu Zhao Gong avoided Ji clan resided outside, for him sought enter Lu, traveling road died, son Jing Gong Tou Man established.

sentences.zh: 景公十六年，魯陽虎來奔，已復去。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 二十五年，孔子過宋，宋司馬桓魋惡之，欲殺孔子，孔子微服去。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 三十年，曹倍宋，又倍晉，宋伐曹，晉不救，遂滅曹有之。

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 三十六年，齊田常弒簡公。

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.

Jing Gong sixteenth year, Lu Yang Hu came fled, already again left. Twenty-fifth year, Kong Qiu passed Song, Song commander Huan Kui hated him, wished kill Kong Qiu, Kong Qiu disguised clothes left. Thirtieth year, Cao betrayed Song, again betrayed Jin, Song attacked Cao, Jin not save, then extinguished Cao possessed it. Thirty-sixth year, Qi Tian Chang assassinated Jian Gong.

sentences.zh: 三十七年，楚惠王滅陳。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

sentences.zh: 熒惑守心。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 心，宋之分野也。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 景公憂之。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 司星子韋曰：「可移於相。」

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 景公曰：「相，吾之股肱。」

translations.text: Yuan Gong's son was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 曰：「可移於民。」

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 景公曰：「君者待民。」

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 曰：「可移於歲。」

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 景公曰：「歲饑民困，吾誰為君！」

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.

sentences.zh: 子韋曰：「天高聽卑。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

sentences.zh: 君有君人之言三，熒惑宜有動。」

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 於是候之，果徙三度。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.

Thirty-seventh year, Chu Hui Wang extinguished Chen. Ying Huo guarded Xin. Xin, Song's field division. Jing Gong worried it. Commander star Zi Wei said: 'Can move to chancellor.' Jing Gong said: 'Chancellor, my limbs.' Said: 'Can move to people.' Jing Gong said: 'Lord waits people.' Said: 'Can move to year.' Jing Gong said: 'Year famine people distressed, I who for lord!' Zi Wei said: 'Heaven high hears low. Lord has lord people's words three, Ying Huo should have movement.' Then awaited it, indeed moved three degrees.

sentences.zh: 六十四年，景公卒。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 宋公子特攻殺太子而自立，是為昭公。

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 昭公者，元公之曾庶孫也。

translations.text: Yuan Gong's son was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 昭公父公孫糾，糾父公子褍秦，褍秦即元公少子也。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 景公殺昭公父糾，故昭公怨殺太子而自立。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

Sixty-fourth year, Jing Gong died. Song gong zi Te attacked killed crown prince self established, this was Zhao Gong. Zhao Gong, Yuan Gong's great grandson concubine born. Zhao Gong father Gong Sun Jiu, Jiu father gong zi Chu Qin, Chu Qin namely Yuan Gong young son. Jing Gong killed Zhao Gong father Jiu, so Zhao Gong resented killed crown prince self established.

sentences.zh: 昭公四十七年卒，子悼公購由立。

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 悼公八年卒，子休公田立。

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.

sentences.zh: 休公田二十三年卒，子辟公辟兵立。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

sentences.zh: 辟公三年卒，子剔成立。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 剔成四十一年，剔成弟偃攻襲剔成，剔成敗奔齊，偃自立為宋君。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.

Zhao Gong forty-seventh year died, son Dao Gong Gou You established. Dao Gong eighth year died, son Xiu Gong Tian established. Xiu Gong Tian twenty-third year died, son Pi Gong Pi Bing established. Pi Gong third year died, son Ti Cheng established. Ti Cheng forty-first year, Ti Cheng younger brother Yan attacked raided Ti Cheng, Ti Cheng defeated fled Qi, Yan self established as Song lord.

sentences.zh: 君偃十一年，自立為王。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

sentences.zh: 東敗齊，取五城；

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 南敗楚，取地三百里；

translations.text: Yuan Gong's son was Zhuang Gong.

sentences.zh: 西敗魏軍，乃與齊、魏為敵國。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 盛血以韋囊，縣而射之，命曰「射天」。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 淫於酒婦人。

translations.text: Xiang Gong's son was Zhao Gong.

sentences.zh: 群臣諫者輒射之。

translations.text: Zhao Gong's son was Qing Gong.

sentences.zh: 於是諸侯皆曰「桀宋」。

translations.text: Qing Gong's son was Kou Gong.

sentences.zh: 「宋其復為紂所為，不可不誅」。

translations.text: Kou Gong's son was Ping Gong.

sentences.zh: 告齊伐宋。

translations.text: Ping Gong's son was Hui Gong.

sentences.zh: 王偃立四十七年，齊湣王與魏、楚伐宋，殺王偃，遂滅宋而三分其地。

translations.text: Hui Gong's son was Dai Gong.

Lord Yan eleventh year, self established as wang. East defeated Qi, took five cities; south defeated Chu, took land three hundred li; west defeated Wei army, then with Qi, Wei became enemy countries. Filled blood with leather bag, hung shot it, named 'shoot heaven'. Lewd in wine women. Group ministers advised then shot them. Then feudal lords all said 'Jie Song'. 'Song will again do Zhou's deeds, not able not execute.' Informed Qi attack Song. Wang Yan established forty-seventh year, Qi Min Wang with Wei, Chu attacked Song, killed wang Yan, then extinguished Song divided its land three ways.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：孔子稱「微子去之，箕子為之奴，比干諫而死，殷有三仁焉」。

translations.text: Dai Gong's son was Yuan Gong.

sentences.zh: 春秋譏宋之亂自宣公廢太子而立弟，國以不寧者十世。

translations.text: Spring Autumn criticized Song's disorder from Xuan Gong abandoned crown prince established younger brother, country with not peaceful ten generations.

sentences.zh: 襄公之時，修行仁義，欲為盟主。

translations.text: Xiang Gong's time, practiced cultivated benevolence righteousness, wished become alliance lord.

sentences.zh: 其大夫正考父美之，故追道契、湯、高宗，殷所以興，作商頌。

translations.text: His grand master Zheng Kao Fu praised it, so traced way Qi, Tang, Gao Zong, Yin so rose, made Shang Song.

sentences.zh: 襄公既敗於泓，而君子或以為多，傷中國闕禮義，褒之也，宋襄之有禮讓也。

translations.text: Xiang Gong already defeated at Hong, but Jun Zi some thought many, injured Chinese lack ritual righteousness, praised him, Song Xiang's had ritual yielding.

Grand Historian said: Kong Qiu called 'Wei Zi left it, Ji Zi became slave for it, Bi Gan advised died, Yin had three benevolent'. Spring Autumn criticized Song's disorder from Xuan Gong abandoned crown prince established younger brother, country with not peaceful ten generations. Xiang Gong's time, practiced cultivated benevolence righteousness, wished become alliance lord. His grand master Zheng Kao Fu praised it, so traced way Qi, Tang, Gao Zong, Yin so rose, made Shang Song. Xiang Gong already defeated at Hong, but Jun Zi some thought many, injured Chinese lack ritual righteousness, praised him, Song Xiang's had ritual yielding.
